trans-unit.source: Products.CalendarX is an add-on for Plone that displays Events [1] in monthly, weekly and daily views. There is also localization for various languages included.
trans-unit.target: Products.CalendarX is an add-on for Plone that displays Events [1] in monthly, weekly and daily views. There is also localization for various languages included.

trans-unit.source: Add missing event_icon.gif [aclark]
trans-unit.target: 添加缺失的event_icon.gif [aclark]

trans-unit.source: CalendarX is a customizable, open source metacalendar application written for the Plone content management system on top of Zope and Python.
trans-unit.target: CalendarX是一个基于Zope和Python为Plone内容管理系统编写的可定制的、开源的元日历应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Code base: v0.6.6(stable)
trans-unit.target: 代码基础:v0.6.6(稳定)

trans-unit.source: Code base: v0.9.0(dev)
trans-unit.target: 代码基础:v0.9.0(开发)

trans-unit.source: Code base: v0.9.1(dev)
trans-unit.target: 代码基础:v0.9.1(开发)

trans-unit.target: 代码基础:v0.9.2(稳定)

trans-unit.source: Finnish translations [miohtama]
trans-unit.target: 芬兰语翻译[miohtama]

trans-unit.source: Fix portet_cx_choices [aclark]
trans-unit.target: 修正 portet_cx_choices [aclark]。

trans-unit.source: Fixed URL escaping issues in month view links [miohtama]
trans-unit.target: 修正了月视图链接中的URL转义问题[miohtama]。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bad portal_catalog query syntax in get events scripts - was returning no results on P4.1 [miohtama]
trans-unit.target: 修正了get events脚本中portal_catalog查询语法错误的问题--在P4.1上没有返回结果[miohtama]。

trans-unit.source: Fixed syntax errors in getEventDictWeekbyday.py, getEventDictWeekbyhour.py [miohtama]
trans-unit.target: 修正了 getEventDictWeekbyday.py,getEventDictWeekbyhour.py [miohtama]中的语法错误。

trans-unit.source: Functionality provided by
trans-unit.target: 提供的功能

trans-unit.source: I.e. event-ish content, e.g. events created with the default Plone event content type.
trans-unit.target: 即事件类内容,例如用默认的Plone事件内容类型创建的事件。

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介紹

trans-unit.source: Make portet_cx_choices portlet display nothing instead of errors (No Plone 4 support yet) [aclark]
trans-unit.target: 让 portet_cx_choices portlet 不显示任何内容,而不是错误 (还没有 Plone 4 支持)[aclark]。

trans-unit.source: Note
trans-unit.target: Noot:

trans-unit.source: Other similar add-ons:
trans-unit.target: 其他类似的附加功能。

trans-unit.source: Plone 4.1 compatibility [miohtama, aclark, nteixeira, kteague] - for Plone 3.x releases use older version
trans-unit.target: Plone 4.1 兼容性 [miohtama,aclark,nteixeira,kteague]-Plone 3.x 版本使用旧版本

trans-unit.source: Refactored documentation to ReST, with help from glenfant. [lupa]
trans-unit.target: 在Glenfant的帮助下,将文件重新调整为ReST。[lupa]

trans-unit.source: Remove entry points causing install_requires to fail [aclark]
trans-unit.target: 删除导致 install_requires 失败的入口点 [aclark]

trans-unit.source: Source code and issue tracker:
trans-unit.target: 源代码和问题跟踪器。

trans-unit.source: Status: Alpha release. All tested features work, one outstanding bug reported in the tracker (at Plone.org), some minor display bugs listed in docs/TODO.txt
trans-unit.target: 状态。阿尔法版本。所有测试过的功能都可以使用,在跟踪器(在Plone.org)中报告了一个未解决的bug,一些小的显示bug在docs/TODO.txt中列出。

trans-unit.source: Status: Pre-alpha dev release. Seems to work, at least enough to test.
trans-unit.target: 状态。Pre-alpha开发版本。似乎可以工作,至少足够测试。

trans-unit.source: Status: Stable release. All tested features work, one outstanding bug reported in the tracker (at Plone.org), some minor display bugs listed in docs/TODO.txt
trans-unit.target: 状态。稳定发布。所有测试过的功能都可以使用,在跟踪器(在Plone.org)中报告了一个未解决的bug,一些小的显示bug在docs/TODO.txt中列出。

trans-unit.source: The codebase is old (i.e. Archetypes content and RestrictedPython scripts) and does not conform to modern Plone development best practices.
trans-unit.target: 代码库是旧的(即Archetypes内容和RestrictedPython脚本),不符合现代Plone开发的最佳实践。

trans-unit.source: Version 0.9.7 and higher are Plone 4+ compatible. For Plone 3.x, please use an older release.
trans-unit.target: 0.9.7及以上版本兼容Plone 4+。对于Plone 3.x,请使用旧版本。

trans-unit.source: and it would NOT evaluate subtitles[n-1] unless usesubtitles was True. However, now it throws a tuple index out of range error, even if usesubtitles is False. So I’m reworking all the tal:content calls that use this sort of testing. The main ones are fixed, allowing us to use the Subject Bar again :-).
trans-unit.target: and it would NOT evaluate subtitles[n-1] unless usesubtitles was True. However, now it throws a tuple index out of range error, even if usesubtitles is False. So I’m reworking all the tal:content calls that use this sort of testing. The main ones are fixed, allowing us to use the Subject Bar again :-).

trans-unit.source: bugfix: CX_props_macros.pt: PrevNextCurrentLinks has JumpToDateWidget that was hardcoded to range(2000:2010) ending soon! Now this runs -4 to +6 years from current year instead.
trans-unit.target: bugfix:CX_props_macros.pt:PrevNextCurrentLinks的JumpToDateWidget被硬编码为range(2000:2010)很快就会结束! 现在,这将从当前年份开始运行-4到+6年。

trans-unit.source: bugfix: CX_props_macros.pt: eventlister, mMeventlister macros: The class: defaulted to “eventPublished” instead of to classstate, fixed.
trans-unit.target: bugfix: CX_props_macros.pt: eventlister, mMeventlister macros: The class: defaulted to “eventPublished” instead of to classstate, fixed.

trans-unit.source: bugfix: CalendarXFolder.py: added ‘createObject?type_name=Event’ as default value for createObjectOnClickCommand.
trans-unit.target: bugfix: CalendarXFolder.py: added ‘createObject?type_name=Event’ as default value for createObjectOnClickCommand.

trans-unit.source: bugfix: Events with NO category (subject) are shown when you show a calendar for the first time (where View All is checked, but none of the other categories are checked), but after that it is nearly impossible to display events with NO category chosen. This is an OLD bug.
trans-unit.target: bugfix:当你第一次显示一个日历时,会显示没有类别(主题)的事件(其中View All被选中,但其他类别都没有被选中),但之后几乎不可能显示选择了没有类别的事件。这是一个老问题。

trans-unit.source: bugfixes for getEventsXXX scripts (all four, for ZCatalog and Advanced Query) to handle properly the options for restrictToThisListOfPaths, restrictToThisListOfSubjects, and the Show Public/Private link that only shows events by the logged in Creator. [lupa]
trans-unit.target: 对getEventsXXX脚本(全部四个,用于ZCatalog和Advanced Query)的bug进行了修正,以正确处理limitToThisListOfPaths、limitToThisListOfSubjects和Show Public/Private链接(仅显示登录的Creator的事件)等选项。[lupa]

trans-unit.source: docs: updated INSTALL.txt to include buildout instructions for pulling CalendarX from SVN at plone.org. An egg is in the future.
trans-unit.target: docs:更新了INSTALL.txt,加入了从plone.org的SVN中拉取CalendarX的构建说明。未来会有一个彩蛋。

trans-unit.source: eggification: thanks to glenfant!
trans-unit.target: 蛋化:感谢格伦方特!

trans-unit.source: improvement: CalendarXFolder.py: added as default the following values: ‘published,external,internal,internally_published’ for the listOfReviewStatesDisplayed properties.
trans-unit.target: improvement: CalendarXFolder.py: added as default the following values: ‘published,external,internal,internally_published’ for the listOfReviewStatesDisplayed properties.

trans-unit.source: in earlier versions of CalendarX has moved to the main calendar area in Plone 4 [aclark]
trans-unit.target: 早期版本的CalendarX已经移到了Plone 4的主日历区[aclark]。

trans-unit.source: mod: CX_props_macros.pt: Bugfix. Wrapped several more tal:conditions around spans to eliminate possible “tuple index out of range” errors coming from the python:test() usage. Needed to get the subcalendars working properly.
trans-unit.target: mod: CX_props_macros.pt: Bugfix. Wrapped several more tal:conditions around spans to eliminate possible “tuple index out of range” errors coming from the python:test() usage. Needed to get the subcalendars working properly.

trans-unit.source: mod: CX_props_macros.pt: Bugfix. i18n bug shows up in Plone 3 because having tal:content and an i18n string together produces a conflict. Now only has i18n call (around line 472).
trans-unit.target: mod.CX_props_macros.pt CX_props_macros.pt:i18n错误在Plone 3中出现,因为tal:content和i18n字符串在一起会产生冲突。现在只有i18n调用(472行左右)。

trans-unit.source: mod: CX_props_macros.pt: Bugfix. i18n msgid mislabeled as label_sublinks_show_backtoresources changed to label_sublinks_backtoresources (around line 475).
trans-unit.target: mod.CX_props_macros.pt CX_props_macros.pt。i18n msgid误标为label_sublinks_show_backtoresources,改为label_sublinks_backtoresources (约第475行)。

trans-unit.source: mod: CX_props_macros.pt: Bugfix. useMultiSubjects attribute works fine, but if you unchecked it, the subjectlinks macro broke. Fixed.
trans-unit.target: mod.CX_props_macros.pt CX_props_macros.pt:修正了bug.useMultiSubjects属性工作正常,但如果你取消了它,subjectlinks宏就会失效.修正了这个问题。

trans-unit.source: mod: CX_props_macros.pt: Significant rewriting needed down in the subjectlinks macro to get the subcalendars working. Sheesh.
trans-unit.target: mod.CX_props_macros.pt CX_props_macros.pt:需要在subjectlinks宏中进行大量的重写才能使子日历正常工作。啧啧。

trans-unit.source: mod: CX_props_macros.pt: Something has changed, probably in Zope 2.10 or possibly more recent Python versions. I used to be able to do this
trans-unit.target: mod.CX_props_macros.pt CX_props_macros.pt:有些东西发生了变化,可能是在Zope 2.10或者更近的Python版本中。我以前可以这样做

trans-unit.source: mod: CX_props_macros.pt: added a “manage” tab that gives easy access to editing the calendar properties. only shows up for logged-in users with “Manage portal content” permission for the calendar instance.
trans-unit.target: mod: CX_props_macros.pt: added a “manage” tab that gives easy access to editing the calendar properties. only shows up for logged-in users with “Manage portal content” permission for the calendar instance.

trans-unit.source: mod: CalendarXFolder.py: Fixed several mislabeled attributes, and changed the order of some of them to more closely match the order and descriptions in the 0.6.6 release. Dropped “Topic” from schemata name for subcalendars, now is “Sub Calendar Properties”.
trans-unit.target: mod: CalendarXFolder.py: Fixed several mislabeled attributes, and changed the order of some of them to more closely match the order and descriptions in the 0.6.6 release. Dropped “Topic” from schemata name for subcalendars, now is “Sub Calendar Properties”.

trans-unit.source: mod: CalendarXFolder.py: Much reworking here to convert it to Archetypes. Pushed all the CX_props sheets into schemata (the hard work of this was done by folks at the PSU CalendarX Patch Sprint in Dec 2007 and checked into the Collective as the /plone3-compatibility branch). I added the CSS properties to finish it. Also fixed default from False to 0 for earlyDayEventHour attribute, which fixed some day and weekbyhour view errors.
trans-unit.target: mod.XFolder.py CalendarXFolder.py:在这里进行了大量的修改,将其转换为Archetypes。将所有的CX_props表推送到模式数据中(这项艰巨的工作是由2007年12月PSU CalendarX补丁冲刺会上的人完成的,并作为/plone3-compatibility分支检查到Collective中)。我添加了CSS属性来完成它。还将earlyDayEventHour属性的默认值从False修正为0,从而修正了一些day和weekbyhour视图的错误。

trans-unit.source: mod: CalendarXFolder.py: TYPO, bugfix: memberSubfolderPath attribute in the Add Event Link Properties schemata was misspelled as memberSubFolderPath. Also updated the description to point out that if there is no member home folder, but this attribute is selected, then it will default back to a folder of this name but in the PORTAL ROOT, not in a member home folder.
trans-unit.target: mod.XFolder.py CalendarXFolder.py:TYPO,bug修正:添加事件链接属性模式中的memberSubfolderPath属性被误写为memberSubFolderPath。同时更新了描述,指出如果没有成员主文件夹,但选择了这个属性,那么它将默认回到这个名字的文件夹,但在PORTAL ROOT中,而不是在成员主文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: mod: CalendarXFolder.py: added aliases to point default view to the new showDefaultView.py redirector script.
trans-unit.target: mod:CalendarXFolder.py:添加了别名,将默认视图指向新的showDefaultView.py重定向脚本。

trans-unit.source: mod: getAddNewEventURL.py: bugfix. There is no member home folder now by default, and so the call to getHomeUrl() returned None, but was not trapped for that. Now it is, and so if there is no member home folder, but this attribute is selected, then it will default back to a folder of this name but in the PORTAL ROOT, not in a member home folder.
trans-unit.target: mod:getAddNewEventURL.py:bug修正。现在默认情况下没有成员home文件夹,所以调用getHomeUrl()返回None,但并没有因此而被捕获。现在有了,所以如果没有成员home文件夹,但选择了这个属性,那么它将默认回到这个名字的文件夹,但在PORTAL ROOT中,而不是在成员home文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: mod: getDictCommon.py: checks for nameOfSubCalendar, uses that instead of the id if it is available for the header at the top of subcalendars.
trans-unit.target: mod:getDictCommon.py:检查nameOfSubCalendar,如果子日历顶部的标题有nameOfSubCalendar,就用它来代替id。

trans-unit.source: mod: getEventsBeforeZC.py, getEventsBetweenZC.py, getEventsBeforeAQ.py, getEventsBetweenAQ.py: modified the review_state query to accommodate the new listOfReviewStatesDisplayed attribute.
trans-unit.target: mod:getEventsBeforeZC.py,getEventsBetweenZC.py,getEventsBeforeAQ.py,getEventsBetweenAQ.py:修改了review_state查询,以适应新的listOfReviewStatesDisplayed属性。

trans-unit.source: mod: po files, added “label_managetab” msgid and (my own, doubtful) translations for each language, except for Japanese (I didn’t translate that one). Write me with better ones, or better yet, check them into svn at the collective and email me that you’ve done so.
trans-unit.target: mod: po files, added “label_managetab” msgid and (my own, doubtful) translations for each language, except for Japanese (I didn’t translate that one). Write me with better ones, or better yet, check them into svn at the collective and email me that you’ve done so.

trans-unit.source: mod: weekbyday.css: Bugfix. Removed CSS rule for TD class=”hour” that was both wrong and superfluous (no such usage in the weekbyday template).
trans-unit.target: mod: weekbyday.css: Bugfix. Removed CSS rule for TD class=”hour” that was both wrong and superfluous (no such usage in the weekbyday template).

trans-unit.source: mod: weekbyhour.pt: Bugfix. Found that the i18n for the bottom day titles was incompletely setup, causing them to remain i18n-less. Line 245 call to display month was missing a suffix ‘_3’. Fixed.
trans-unit.target: mod: weekbyhour.pt: Bugfix. Found that the i18n for the bottom day titles was incompletely setup, causing them to remain i18n-less. Line 245 call to display month was missing a suffix ‘_3’. Fixed.

trans-unit.source: new: CalendarXFolder.py: Added a new attribute listOfReviewStatesDisplayed where you can add other review states (such as ‘pending’ or ‘external’) and these will be appended onto the other states to display in your calendar.
trans-unit.target: new: CalendarXFolder.py: Added a new attribute listOfReviewStatesDisplayed where you can add other review states (such as ‘pending’ or ‘external’) and these will be appended onto the other states to display in your calendar.

trans-unit.source: new: CalendarXFolder.py: Added a new attribute listOfSubCalendarIDs that is necessary in order to properly use subcalendars.
trans-unit.target: 新增:CalendarXFolder.py。增加了一个新的属性listOfSubCalendarIDs,这是正确使用子日历所必需的。

trans-unit.source: new: added i18n/calendarx-sv.po file, contributed over a year ago by Martin Eliasson. I added (probably very wrongly) a guestimate of the translation of “manage” for the new manage tab, which didn’t exist when Martin originally sent this to me.
trans-unit.target: new: added i18n/calendarx-sv.po file, contributed over a year ago by Martin Eliasson. I added (probably very wrongly) a guestimate of the translation of “manage” for the new manage tab, which didn’t exist when Martin originally sent this to me.

trans-unit.source: new: showDefaultView.py. This simple script simply redirects to the view specified in the defaultView attribute. Used when you head toward the calendar without adding /month or /day or whatever view you want at the end.
trans-unit.target: new:showDefaultView.py。这个简单的脚本只是重定向到defaultView属性中指定的视图。当你走向日历时使用,而不需要在最后添加/月或/日或任何你想要的视图。

trans-unit.source: portlet_cx_choices
trans-unit.target: portlet_cx_choices

trans-unit.source: still to do: Possible problems with restrictToThisListOfSubjects, where View All categories highlights all subjects, but doesn’t then display events with subject other than those checked, or does if it isn’t restricted? Check pls.
trans-unit.target: still to do: Possible problems with restrictToThisListOfSubjects, where View All categories highlights all subjects, but doesn’t then display events with subject other than those checked, or does if it isn’t restricted? Check pls.

trans-unit.source: still to do: explore the new /tests added by the Sprinters. I haven’t learned the use of testing in Plone yet, although I did learn it this summer in some other systems. I’ll get to that next and maybe soon we’ll actually have a meaningful test suite for CalendarX!
trans-unit.target: still to do: explore the new /tests added by the Sprinters. I haven’t learned the use of testing in Plone yet, although I did learn it this summer in some other systems. I’ll get to that next and maybe soon we’ll actually have a meaningful test suite for CalendarX!

trans-unit.source: still to do: find the other po files given to me long ago, and put them in. Don’t forget the “label_managetab” msgid.
trans-unit.target: still to do: find the other po files given to me long ago, and put them in. Don’t forget the “label_managetab” msgid.

trans-unit.source: still to do: fix more darned tuple index errors… I’m not seeing any of them show up, but I know that the code doesn’t have the checks that it needs yet.
trans-unit.target: still to do: fix more darned tuple index errors… I’m not seeing any of them show up, but I know that the code doesn’t have the checks that it needs yet.

trans-unit.source: still to do: fix the damned mouseover highlighting errors
trans-unit.target: 仍要做的是:修复该死的鼠标高亮错误

trans-unit.source: tal:content="python:test(usesubtitles,subtitles[n-1],`subby)"
trans-unit.target: tal:content="python:test(usesubtitles,字幕[n-1],`subby)"

trans-unit.source: thefix: getDictCommon.py: checks to see if xsubALL is in the request and set to ‘ALL’ – if it is, it sets xsub to ‘ALL’ before sending xsub to the query. Now by default, the View All checkbox WILL display events with NO category chosen. To see ONLY those events with selected categories, you must hit the Refresh button when all the categories are selected, but the View All is not selected. This makes intuitive sense to me. View All means ALL (including those with NO selected category).
trans-unit.target: thefix: getDictCommon.py: checks to see if xsubALL is in the request and set to ‘ALL’ – if it is, it sets xsub to ‘ALL’ before sending xsub to the query. Now by default, the View All checkbox WILL display events with NO category chosen. To see ONLY those events with selected categories, you must hit the Refresh button when all the categories are selected, but the View All is not selected. This makes intuitive sense to me. View All means ALL (including those with NO selected category).

trans-unit.source: v0.9.1(alpha)
trans-unit.target: v0.9.1(alpha)

v0.9.3(stable)

why: 0.9 branch is to introduce Plone 3 compatibility. Period.
